name: Lucidica
description: Lucidica comprises of a team of both tech nerds and cool behind the scenes professionals, specialising in providing friendly and reliable IT support, consulting and training for small businesses in London. Lucidica provides server & computer support (including Apple Macs); web & email hosting; system design & installations; I.T. consulting; website design, development & maintenance; computer training; email/search engine marketing and optimisation.
